Title: Establishes the crime of package theft in the fourth, third, second and first degrees
Summary: Establishes the crime of package theft in the fourth, third, second and first degrees; designates such crimes as a class A misdemeanor, class E felony, class D felony, and class B felony, respectively; provides instances that are not a defense to such crimes; provides for certain defenses to such crimes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crime of package theft in the fourth, third, second and first degrees
